name: [Bringer of the Mountain and Desert]
description:
This is my entry for the fourth Bullet Hell Engines' contest (Link for server)
BHA4's theme is similar to the Danmakufu Contest 9 ~ Perfect Memento in Self-insert Sense. For this theme, you will be to create a script featuring your own self-insert, your own OC or an OC of someone you know (with given explicit permission)!
Any questions or bugs? Send it to my discord (Drekareen#8312)

Credits:  

  • Bullet Hell Engines and Shrines & Youkai: Moral Support 
  • Tricky: Tricky.
  • Avi: Boss' dialogue portrait (Twitter)
  • Banana: They're good people
  • Terraformer9x: Shotsheet (Link in Bulletforge)
  • Gabe: Boss' cutin (Twitter)
  • Natashi: ph3sx

Playtesters: BlueKirby, pillowsoftzino, Merztwin, InceRabbit, Incandescence, Pivot Whiteground Lever, Horrible Tales, GreenDinobot, Trickysticks, Taizen, Redrin and Natashi.  
Watched a playtester: Joonkeh, FelyneCatto (Meowstic)

BGM: Hive Jump - Only You Can Prevent Cavern Fires
BGM: Hive Jump - Scorching the Scorcher
